Package org.magicdgs.readtools.cmd.argumentcollections

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BarcodeDetectorArgumentCollection
    Argument collection for barcode detector.
    FixBarcodeAbstractArgumentCollection
    Abstract argument collection for fixing barcodes that are encoded in different places than the RAW_BARCODE_TAG tag.
    FixBarcodeAbstractArgumentCollection.FixBarcodeWithQualitiesArgumentCollection
    Implementation with barocde qualities
    FixBarcodeAbstractArgumentCollection.FixSimpleBarcodeArgumentCollection
    Implementation without barcode qualities.
    ReadGroupArgumentCollection
    Picard AddOrReplaceReadGroup arguments, except library, sample name, read group description and program group.
    RTInputArgumentCollection
    Argument collection for ReaTools input files.
    RTOutputArgumentCollection
    Abstract class for all output arguments in ReadTools.
    RTOutputBamArgumentCollection
    Simple output argument collection for output SAM/BAM/CRAM files, without splitting.
    RTOutputBamSplitArgumentCollection
    Output argument collection for output SAM/BAM/CRAM files but allowing splitting by sample, read group and/or library.
    RTOutputFastqArgumentCollection
    Output argument collection for output FASTQ files.
    TrimmerPluginArgumentCollection
    Argument collection to use with TrimmerPluginDescriptor.
